Read a pixel data item

ReadMPX_item.Rd

Function that unzips a .pxl file into a temporary folder and reads any number of items (not anndata) as specified in items. If more than one item is fetched, the output is a list of data frames. Otherwise the output is a single tbl_df.

Usage

ReadMPX_item(
  filename,
  items = c("colocalization", "polarization", "edgelist"),
  verbose = TRUE
)

ReadMPX_polarization(filename, verbose = TRUE)

ReadMPX_colocalization(filename, verbose = TRUE)

ReadMPX_edgelist(filename, verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

filename

Path to a .pxl file

items

One of "colocalization", "polarization", "edgelist"

verbose

Print messages

Value

Either an object of class tbl_df or a list of tbl_df

objects if multiple items are selected

See also

Other data-loaders: ReadMPX_Seurat()

Examples


library(pixelatorR)

# Load example data
pxl_file <- system.file("extdata/PBMC_10_cells",
                        "Sample01_test.pxl",
                        package = "pixelatorR")
polarization <- ReadMPX_item(pxl_file, items = "polarization")
#> ℹ Loading item(s) from: /private/var/folders/gw/bdcqhnvs0m9gs_mq8n51jtbc0000gn/T/RtmpHmlprD/temp_libpath148616148d180/pixelatorR/extdata/PBMC_10_cells/Sample01_test.pxl

polarization <- ReadMPX_polarization(pxl_file)
#> ℹ Loading item(s) from: /private/var/folders/gw/bdcqhnvs0m9gs_mq8n51jtbc0000gn/T/RtmpHmlprD/temp_libpath148616148d180/pixelatorR/extdata/PBMC_10_cells/Sample01_test.pxl
